content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: prismarine_bricks
inventory=[{"type": "crafting_table", "quantity": 24, "index": 14}, {"type": "cobblestone_stairs", "quantity": 44, "index": 21}, {"type": "prismarine_shard", "quantity": 9, "index": 25}, {"type": "netherite_scrap", "quantity": 57, "index": 27}, {"type": "cobblestone_wall", "quantity": 37, "index": 29}]
thought: To craft prismarine bricks, I need to place 9 prismarine shards in a 3x3 crafting grid. Therefore, I will first move 1 shard from slot 25 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 25 to slot 1 with quantity 1
